content: Hello everyone,my name is Eric Steele, Trying to touch base with members of my old unit B or C Co, 1st 37th Armor division that were station in Germany at Katterbach Kaserne, Katterbach just outside Ansbach during 1977-78. My email is email address deleted, personal contact information is unauthorized, please contact me here or at the email address listed. Looking to reunite This message has been edited.
